channel.title: Image on Gerard McGarry
channel.description: Recent content in Image on Gerard McGarry

item.title: No Filter: Life On Instagram
item.description: A round-up of photos from Instagram. From travels to far flung places. And near flung places.

item.title: Portumna Castle
item.description: The boys and I have just come back from a short trip to Galway. On the second day we stopped off at Portumna, a quiet little town that Lisa and I discovered on a Shannon cruise about 9 years previously.

item.title: Malta, November 2000
item.description: A photo from back in November 2000, the first big holiday Lisa and I ever took. We stayed near St Julian’s in Malta and one day took this brilliant cruise around the bay, which was just so relaxing.

item.title: Venice, July 2008
item.description: Photo dump from a family holiday to Venice in 2008.
